at.tm.rmi.utils

Class PIArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tm.rmi.utils.PIArgs

  • public class PIArgs
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Patrick Malik, Thomas Taschner This class provides a default constructor which sets some predefined values and parametrized one where you can input all the parameters the class has to offer. It also features getter and setter methods for its attributes.

      Constructor which uses every possible class attribute to set it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PIArgs

        public PIArgs()
        Default constructor, initializes with some predefined values

      • PIArgs

        public PIArgs(java.lang.String hostname,
              int port,
              int servercount,
              int clientcount,
              int decimal_places,
              java.lang.String server_name,
              int serverport)
        Constructor which uses every possible class attribute to set it.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the targets hostname or IP address
        port - the targets port which is used for establishing a connection
        servercount - the amount of servers that are used
        clientcount - the amount of clients that are used
        decimal_places - the amount of calculated decimal places of PI
        server_name - the servers name
        serverport - the port the server uses
